cross_validation.quote: Our best single lgbm model was trained on 29xx features. 5 folds CV - no stratification by any option

ensemble_method.quote: Blend -> Power (2) rank blend of Dart lgbm (0.801 public) / GBDT lgbm (0.799 public) / Catboost models (0.799 public)

prediction_averaging.quote: Blend -> Power (2) rank blend of Dart lgbm (0.801 public) / GBDT lgbm (0.799 public) / Catboost models (0.799 public)

libraries.quote: Our best single lgbm model... Blend -> Power (2) rank blend of Dart lgbm (0.801 public) / GBDT lgbm (0.799 public) / Catboost models (0.799 public)

time_series_features.quote: Diffs -> diff between last and mean, last and min, last and max, last and std / Ratios -> ratio between last and mean, last and min, last and max, last and std / Lags -> Lag 1 / EWM -> Exponential Weighted Mean features (alpha = 0.2) / Normalization -> CustomerID normalization by mean / PCA -> PCA dim reduction to 20 and 40 features

data_denoising.quote: Isle identification -> Features for checking if customer is Isle

categorical_encoding.quote: Ordinal encoding for B_30, B_38, D_114, D_116, D_117, D_120, D_126, D_63, D_64, D_66, D_68 / Onehot encoding for Ordinal features

feature_scaling.quote: Normalization -> CustomerID normalization by mean / Standardization -> Normalization for NaN values

boosting_type.quote: Blend -> Power (2) rank blend of Dart lgbm (0.801 public) / GBDT lgbm (0.799 public)

feature_selection_method.quote: Stepped Hierarchical Permutation Importance -> Drop low importance features at every iterations / Forward feature selection / Adversarial validation / 5-fold stratified time series split
